briefTitle: Aim 3, Adapting and Implementing Evidence-based Breast Cancer Follow-up in Primary Care
officialTitle: Adapting and Implementing Evidence-based Breast Cancer Follow-up in Primary Care
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in Comprehensive Breast Cancer Follow-up Care
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Self-identification as a staff member or patient who has had breast cancer in a participating practice

Exclusion Criteria:

* Unable to speak, understand and/or read English
* Unable to provide informed consent
